channel.title: OSX on Scott O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in OSX on Scott O'Brien

item.title: PDF Automator in OSX
item.description: As you may have been aware from my previous blog posts, I’ve been trying to make my life digital, that means any papers I get, I scan and file on a FileServer (with remote backups, etc, etc). My scanner at home has a document feeder on it. The problem is that it doesn’t do duplex, only a set of sides. So far, I can scan one side of the document, flip the paper of, then scan the back pages.
